name: The Cameron Files 2: The Pharaoh's Curse
name_original: The Cameron Files 2: The Pharaoh's Curse
description:
The Cameron Files 2: The Pharaoh's Curse is an adventure game developed by Galilea Multimedia. It was originally released in 2002. It was published by The Adventure Company. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play The Cameron Files 2: The Pharaoh's Curse on PC.
